reviews.productTitle: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer Switch with Wallplate with LED+ Advanced Technology, for LED and Incandescent, 3 Way/Multi Location, STCL-153MW-WH, White
reviews.text: Bought and installed 20. Excellent. Slide finger up/down vertical LED bank on dimmer and dimmer setting follows (no plastic track partts to wear / break). Works perfectly as Single Pole / Single Toggle or with Sunnata Accessory switch as part of a 3-way or 4-way. Programmable features (such as variable intensity Switch night / locator light). Really like the touch/hold 2 seconds option that dims lights to off 30 seconds later. Totally stable with ceiling surface and recessed-can replacement LEDs. Some intermittent flickering (1 or 2 times a week at startup) with 100 W equivalent LED bulbs (bulb or fixture???). Almost no intermittent flicker with 60W equivalent bulbs. Works extremely well with incandescent bulbs.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2024
reviews.title: Works perfectly

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer Switch with Wallplate with LED+ Advanced Technology, for LED and Incandescent, 3 Way/Multi Location, STCL-153MW-WH, White
reviews.text: I have several of these in my house, and I really like them. They’re clean and elegant and look very high-end. But. I have persistent issues with them turning themselves on at full or partial brightness, when no-one has been anywhere near the switch. An example - I have a seldom-used guest bedroom, and I’ve had to start routinely checking it each day because I’ll find that the dimmer switch is inexplicably set to ~10% brightness (bulbs not even visibly on, but the switch’s light-bar is 10% illuminated) or even fully-on. Either a) I have ghosts/unauthorized guests, or b) there is something weird in my house wiring (other switches all seem to work fine), or c) there’s a glitch in the Lutron switch units I have. I’d still recommend them, but it’s a puzzler.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2024
reviews.title: These are great, but is anyone else finding they turn on randomly?

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer Switch with Wallplate with LED+ Advanced Technology, for LED and Incandescent, 3 Way/Multi Location, STCL-153MW-WH, White
reviews.text: Let's be clear - I dont mess with electricity ever! In fact, this was my first install of anything beyond a smoke alarm which didn't need electricity anyhow! This was an easy install... 15 minutes tops and that was mostly to double check everything I was doing 10 times over. I like how you just slide your finger up and down and dont need to actually press anything to adjust. It's pretty slick. And it has a soft glowing bar that lets you know if the lights are 1/3rd dimmed or 3/4 or wherever you stop your finger. It's modern and is very seamless and unobtrusive on a wall. The trickiest thing was the wall plate and separating it so I could screw the base plate in and then reattach the wall plate to the base. They come connected and separating them makes it feel like you will break it. Use an old credit card to slip between them and they pop apart. We looked that up online. Otherwise, easy install like I said. They could just use that pro-tip in their directions!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024
reviews.title: Easy to install touch dimmer

The associated remote 3-way dimmer switch (I ordered two and neither are remote controls, they are simply 3-way switches, over $25 each.) does not control the original base unit. I am sorely disappointed.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer Switch with Wallplate with LED+ Advanced Technology, for LED and Incandescent, 3 Way/Multi Location, STCL-153MW-WH, White
reviews.text: This switch will only dim LED bulbs that are dimmable, so make sure you know what you have before installing. Using it on a non-dimmable bulb will do nothing except on & off. I really needed a switch like this because of the 3-way function. It allows me to keep on of the switches "normal" and use this switch (either physically ) or using the Lutron app. I also have a Lutron Caseta Smart Hub, so I also get the ability to use this with my Amazon Alexa. It wasn't too difficult to install and the instructions are pretty straight-forward even with limited electrical experience. It's really nice to be able to control my overhead lighting with this switch remotely.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.title: Great switches for a staircase/hallway landing light.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer Switch with Wallplate with LED+ Advanced Technology, for LED and Incandescent, 3 Way/Multi Location, STCL-153MW-WH, White
reviews.text: Overall I’m satisfied with this switch. It’s not perfect but still high quality. What I Like 👍 + came with a seamless switch plate. + Easy to install and the wires were labeled (which is honestly quite rare) + touch sensor to adjust the light. + worked on the first try. What I dislike 👎 - touch sensor. This is a personal preference but I prefer the physical slider model over this touch sensor. My worry is “what if…” it fails or doesn’t respond to my inputs? - Not really a switch. Both ends of the paddle switch are just little clicking buttons. So there is really no switching going on just clicking of the two buttons (on and off). Again a personal preference, but I prefer physical switches over fully digital. Overall this is a great product. If you like something with a more modern look and functionality then this is a great option. If you’re more like me and prefer physical touch, then check out one of their other models that offer the same functionality.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.title: Trusted Brand

reviews.title: Easy install

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer Switch with Wallplate with LED+ Advanced Technology, for LED and Incandescent, 3 Way/Multi Location, STCL-153MW-WH, White
reviews.text: I have tried multiple dimmer types over the last few years, and I think this one has the best implemented dimmer features. The touch bar to slide and set the dimmer is pretty awesome. The light bar is bright when using the dimmer, but subdued when the switch is off. As mentioned in the product features, the soft glow at night helps spot the switch in the dark. Although this dimmer supports LED bulbs, I use it with fixtures which still have incandescent bulbs. Why? Because it's a room that we rarely have the lights on in, and the soft on and soft off feature also helps significantly extend the life of the bulbs. That is one feature that I think is absolutely essential for dimmers: A soft ramp to on, and a soft ramp to off. With incandescent bulbs, it gently heats the filament and reduces the thermal shock to it. This significantly extends the life of incandescent bulbs. In fact, I have had the same incandescent bulbs in one fixture for over nine years now. I highly recommend this dimmer for someone looking for something that is still easy to use, and offers some of the best dimmer features.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.title: Novel light bar for dimmer level, easy to install

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer Switch with Wallplate with LED+ Advanced Technology, for LED and Incandescent, 3 Way/Multi Location, STCL-153MW-WH, White
reviews.text: Lutron generally makes a good dimmer,especially if you're using a tested light per Lutron's listing (check the website for compatibility). This one is no exception, since it's their LED hybrid dimmer behind a fancy cover plate. I'd admit to preferring the Maestro control or Skylark slider, but this one looks cool and feels cool to use. Would definitely fit into a more modern setting. Install is pretty similar to every other dimming switch. All of the required wire nuts and cover plate are included. Just bring your screwdriver.

reviews.title: Love Lutron

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer Switch with Wallplate with LED+ Advanced Technology, for LED and Incandescent, 3 Way/Multi Location, STCL-153MW-WH, White
reviews.text: The kit contains a dimmer switch and a wall plate, both of which are included in one package. The wall plate is designed in a screwless manner, providing a modern and sleek appearance. Although the item comes with a relatively higher price tag, it is a dependable switch that has been utilized in a recent renovation project without any reported issues. Installing the dimmer switch is a breeze, and the switch's back's size is small enough to fit into a standard single-gang box. The kit comes complete with a backing plate and a screwless cover that can be effortlessly mounted over the switch, giving a tidy and modern appearance. The switch is fashioned with a touch panel that enables the user to choose the desired light level. The light on the touch panel signifies the level of brightness selected. The switch can be turned on and off by tapping the top or bottom. When the lights are turned off, the touch dimmer emits a faint glow, making it effortless to locate the switch in the darkness without being distracting. This dimmer switch has undergone rigorous testing and is proven to be a reliable addition to your home. ✅I hope you’ve found the information and my review helpful.✅
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.title: Luton on the Top as Always

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer Switch with Wallplate with LED+ Advanced Technology, for LED and Incandescent, 3 Way/Multi Location, STCL-153MW-WH, White
reviews.text: These dimmers are a really nice improvement to the standard slide dimers I’m used to. It looks cleaner and the capacitive touch slider makes for a nicer experience. Something to note is that these aren’t rocker switches as much as they are momentary rockers. What I mean by that is the switch doesn’t lock into the up or down position, but rather it clicks when you press up or down and returns to the same resting position in the center. It was a little weird at first, but I got used to it. It is nice if it’s wired as a 3-way switch since you don’t have the up or down position being seen as on or off. I like that it’s UL listed. It’s well made and comes with everything you need right out of the box. The screwless wall plate adds to the clean look, although I don’t know why Lutron uses a visible 2-piece design. It’s one of the only things that I’m not a fan of on this combo kit. Overall, it’s an easy upgrade to update the look and feel of your dimmer switches if you care to do so.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.title: Nicer than the older slider style

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer Switch with Wallplate with LED+ Advanced Technology, for LED and Incandescent, 3 Way/Multi Location, STCL-153MW-WH, White
reviews.text: This switch installs like any other dimmer. It does NOT require a neutral, which surprised me. It will also work in a three-way setup, which also surprised me. Operation of the dimmer is by touch, so it can be a little tricky to get used to. The switch face is a toggle. Push the top to turn the light on and the bottom to switch it off. Now if you want to dim it, the face of the switch is a touch-sensitive pad. Just slide a finger up or down to dim. It's not quite as easy to finely control as a slider or rotating dimmer, but it's not bad.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.title: Easy installation, takes some practice to use it

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer Switch with Wallplate with LED+ Advanced Technology, for LED and Incandescent, 3 Way/Multi Location, STCL-153MW-WH, White
reviews.text: We have these light switches installed in most of our main living areas. They are incredibly clean looking and so satisfying to use. It’s not a hard install, simply turn off the circuit breaker to that room and swap out your switch. The wires are attached by little screws. We get compliments on our switches every time guest come over. The actually rocker switch works great but the best part is the light bar dimmer. It always glows so you can see it in the dark (brightness can be adjusted) and you slide your finger up and down the touch light bar to adjust the dimness in the room. Reliable brand, amazing product. You won’t regret these!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.title: Best Light Switches out there
